name: Deadline (itch) (James Hawkins)
description:
WASD for controls

Space to jump

E to interact with levers and buttons

Buttons only last a few seconds

It is meant to be a bit of a rage game, so just keep at it!

This game is for MiniJam 72, the theme was adventure so we used basic tropes from adventure games like necromancers and clerics. The limitation was that death had to be a core concept, so you need to die to progress.
